summary.value: The battle here was fought long before humanity existed... but were they really so different?

data.haunt:
If the Hauntee has any Bonds of hatred, they are @EFFECT[dazed] and cannot recover until the Haunt is banished or the scene ends, but their melee and ranged attacks deal 2 extra damage for each Bond of hatred they have.

If they do not, then on each of their turns, they may ask a question about a creature they can see concerning what is motivating that creature to struggle, and what might make them stand down. The GM answers truthfully.
data.ritual: Bring creatures who have little in common together - in battle, or in peace.
